predictions.text: U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.10% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verification via FRED series DGS2 daily close. Success if any observation on or before 2025-11-30 shows DGS2 ≤ 4.10%.
monitoring_signals: FOMC communications and Nov decision tone
predictions.rationale: Shutdown risks and an expected Fed hold modestly raise odds of front-end yield dips.

predictions.text: ICE BofA U.S. High Yield OAS (FRED: BAMLH0A0HYM2) will close at or above 4.00% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verification via FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2 daily close. Success if any observation on or before 2025-11-30 shows ≥ 4.00%.
monitoring_signals: HYG/LQD ETF price action and flows
predictions.rationale: Tight spreads face pressure from policy uncertainty and late-cycle risks.

predictions.text: Henry Hub Natural Gas front-month futures (NYMEX: NG) will settle at or above $3.40 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use official CME/NYMEX settlement for the front-month NG contract. Success if any daily settlement ≥ $3.40 by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly storage levels vs 5-year average
predictions.rationale: Seasonal heating demand and LNG pulls support a test of mid-$3s.

predictions.text: Ethereum (ETH-USD) will close at or above $4,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Yahoo Finance ETH-USD end-of-day close (UTC). Success if any daily close ≥ $4,000 by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: L2 activity, gas fees, staking flows
predictions.rationale: Crypto beta remains sensitive to liquidity and BTC momentum; a breakout is plausible.

predictions.text: U.S. Core PCE price index (MoM, SA) for September 2025 will print between 0.20% and 0.30% in the BEA release on 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using BEA Personal Income and Outlays release. Success if Core PCE MoM (SA) is within 0.20%–0.30%.
predictions.rationale: Gradual disinflation with sticky services suggests a 0.2–0.3% MoM outcome.

predictions.text: Euro area HICP (headline, YoY, flash) for October 2025 will print between 2.2% and 2.7% in Eurostat’s release due by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via Eurostat flash HICP press release. Success if headline YoY flash is within 2.2%–2.7%.
monitoring_signals: Energy base effects and spot prices
Country CPI flashes (DE, FR, ES, IT)
predictions.rationale: Energy disinflation and cooling core keep headline near mid-2s.

predictions.text: EIA-reported U.S. commercial crude oil inventories (ex-SPR) will increase by at least +6.0 million barrels in a single week in at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report, the ‘Change from previous week’ for commercial crude (excluding SPR). Success if any weekly change ≥ +6.0 mb by deadline.
predictions.rationale: Autumn refinery maintenance often yields sizeable crude builds.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Google will announce a reduction of the standard U.S. Google Play in-app purchase service fee to 20% or lower.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if an official Google policy post or blog updates the standard Play fee schedule, showing ≤20% for U.S. in-app purchases, published by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Court orders/settlement terms in Play antitrust cases
predictions.rationale: Legal pressure to open distribution increases odds of fee cuts.

predictions.text: The ChatGPT iOS app (U.S.) will rank in the Top 5 of the App Store Top Free Apps on at least 7 distinct days between 2025-10-07 and 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via reputable app-rank trackers (e.g., data.ai, AppMagic, Appfigures) showing daily U.S. iOS Top Free ranks. Success if Top 5 rank occurs on ≥7 distinct days in window.
monitoring_signals: Press coverage and social media traction
predictions.rationale: New apps/AgentKit and massive user base should sustain high ranks.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, mediators will announce a jointly endorsed ceasefire framework between Israel and Hamas emerging from Cairo talks, acknowledged by both parties and Egypt.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if Egypt and both Israel and Hamas publicly acknowledge a ceasefire framework document or joint parameters via official statements or widely reported by major outlets (AP/Reuters/NYT).
predictions.rationale: Renewed Cairo talks raise odds of a framework announcement, albeit fragile.

predictions.text: Freddie Mac PMMS 30-year fixed-rate mortgage will print at or below 6.40% in at least one weekly release by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via Freddie Mac PMMS weekly mortgage survey. Success if any published 30-year fixed average ≤ 6.40% by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: If yields ease on softer data and policy hold, mortgage rates can tick lower.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–New York weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-11-30 will be at least 25% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Drewry WCI weekly published rates for Shanghai–New York. Success if any weekly print by 2025-11-30 ≥ 1.25× the 2025-09-05 rate.
predictions.rationale: Peak-season demand and ongoing disruptions should sustain higher Transpac rates.
